languages.text: {n}Недовольно зарычав, Соломон по-прежнему сжимает оружие. Он свирепо и упрямо повторяет:{/n} "Я их видел".
{n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."
languages.original_text: {n}Недовольно зарычав, Соломон по-прежнему сжимает оружие. Он свирепо и упрямо повторяет:{/n} "Я их видел".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne lowers his weapon — but does not let go of it. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne lowers his weapon — but does not let go of it. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne lowers his weapon — but does not let go of it. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."
{n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

languages.text: {n}Avec un grondement mécontent, Solomorne refuse de baisser son arme.{/n} « Je les ai vus, » {n}grogne-t-il obstinément.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un grondement mécontent, Solomorne refuse de baisser son arme.{/n} « Je les ai vus, » {n}grogne-t-il obstinément.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは不機嫌そうにうなり声をあげながら、武器を下ろす。だが手放しはしなかった。彼は激しく、そして頑なに繰り返した。{/n}「奴らを見たんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled growl, Solomorne lowers his weapon — but does not let go of it. He snarls fiercely and stubbornly,{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは不機嫌そうにうなり声をあげながら、武器を下ろす。だが手放しはしなかった。彼は激しく、そして頑なに繰り返した。{/n}「奴らを見たんだ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne gruñe contrariado y se niega a bajar el arma. Testarudo, refunfuña:{/n} «Los he visto».
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gruñe contrariado y se niega a bajar el arma. Testarudo, refunfuña:{/n} «Los he visto».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙不满地低吼着，不肯放下武器。他凶狠而固执地咆哮着：{/n}“我看到他们了。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙不满地低吼着，不肯放下武器。他凶狠而固执地咆哮着：{/n}“我看到他们了。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, huysuz bir homurtuyla silahını indirmeyi reddediyor. Öfkeden deliye dönmüş hâlde, inatla âdeta hırlıyor.{/n} "Onları gördüm."
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, huysuz bir homurtuyla silahını indirmeyi reddediyor. Öfkeden deliye dönmüş hâlde, inatla âdeta hırlıyor.{/n} "Onları gördüm."

languages.text: {n}Mit gefletschten Zähnen weigert sich Solomorne, seine Waffe zu senken. Er knurrt grimmig und störrisch:{/n} "Ich habe sie gesehen."
languages.original_text: {n}With a disgruntled snarl, Solomorne refuses to lower his weapon. He growls fiercely and stubbornly:{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit gefletschten Zähnen weigert sich Solomorne, seine Waffe zu senken. Er knurrt grimmig und störrisch:{/n} "Ich habe sie gesehen."
